channel.title: Im not religious... so i cant celebreate christmas?
channel.description:
Ok, so i am Agnostic, not christian...
when people hear about this for some reason they get offended that im celebrating Christmas. Well Screw You
Christmas is no longer religious. Christmas is about Santa and presents, no one gives a shit about the previous reasons of it except for a low percentage of religious fanatics.
Sure some guy that alot of you think is super cool was born on this day but we have all gotten bored of you telling us about it so this is what you get. Christmas is no longer religious.
Seriosly, 5 to 10 years ago, i couldnt go 2 mins without seeing a manger in the middle of a shopping center or a cross hanging on someones door. Now the only indication you get that its christmas is the flashing lights, the fat red men and the copious amounts of presents.
Non Religious people rejoice! We have taken Christmas! The day that Christ was born is no longer a religious day

item.title: Im not religious... so i cant celebreate christmas?
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

[quote=“King Redrum, post:62, topic:252845”][quote author=Squigglyo link=topic=333995.msg2604384#msg2604384 date=1230448063]
well theres more than enough of them around… there like Asians… there everywhere
[/quote]

Heh, now that was funny. Anyway, hopefully I’ll be around when the next one shows up, but I’m heading out for now, in the process of preparing to move in 3 days. >_<

Peace out, Squig, if one pops up, flame 'em for me. <_<[/quote]

You’re a complete fucking idiot, shut up. I’m sick of you posting about me in every single topic you post in. Just because in one topic I speak about my faith, and shed some light on certain issues doesn’t make me resident Bible Boi. You don’t know me, and I hope it stays that way. Stop acting like you’re better than anyone, you’re not, in fact, far from it.

The entire subject, religion, should be banned from the forums. I’m so sick of people hijacking threads that have very little in common with some form of religion. I’m sick of idiots posting topics about religions to get a hot topic going. I’m also very sick of ignorant people who claim to be a religious person, yet know nothing about their religion. And in turn destroy the reputation of that religion.

If you bunch of douche bags would quit flaming people because of their faith then this wouldn’t be an issue. Sure he was asking for it. But even still, be the better person and let it go. There’s no reason to turn a one page topic into 3 pages of spam. The obvious reason for it even being made was to get some posts out of it.

This should be locked.

Read full topic

item.title: Im not religious... so i cant celebreate christmas?
item.dc:creator: @Squigglyo Squigglyo
item.description:
@Squigglyo wrote:

wow i leave my comp for 1 day and my thread gets hijacked, its point of view changed, and someone flamed into oblivion… god i love this forum.

now being the lazy bastard i am, i cant be fucked coming up with replys to all the stupid responses from the christfag thats been posting in my thread, so instead im just going to laugh not at his beliefs but at the way attitude he has that he is better than us non belivers…

Yes, believing that some Jewish zombie from the stars can grant you wishes when telepathically talk to him…

furthermore, if its ok with you christfags i am going to continue to celebrate my Christmas but only because of the material possessions i obtained because of it.

item.title: Im not religious... so i cant celebreate christmas?
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

[quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:51, topic:252845”]Like I said: If something has a positive outcome for a dog, he’ll do it. Even if it means he has to bite his owner.

Most Christians are the same. They go to church all the time, but they are the ones that are fraudulent. For them, personal gain is more important then anything else. And yes, religion is a form of personal gain too. It makes you feel secure, it’s an easy way to answer all questions that matter, but it’s wrong.[/quote]
The entire Christian religion is filled with hypocrisy. I once heard a sermon where the priest said that perhaps there must be an inherent amount of hypocrisy for the church to work. He then went on to criticize the people who criticize the catholic church, something about well organized journalists who have nothing better to do. Bullshit much? I think so.

Read full topic
